Name: FAERIE FIRE
Description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined inblue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature inthe area when lhe spell is cast is also outlined in light ifit fails a Dexterity saving throw. For lhe duration, objectsand affected creatures shed dim light in a 10.fool radius.Any attack roll against an affected creature or objecthas arlvantage if the attacker can see it, and the affectedcreature or object can't benefit from being invisible.
